CTY1S.HE.summary: Citycon Oyj, a real estate investment company, operates as an owner, manager, and developer of mixed-use centers for urban living in the Nordic region. It develops retail, office space, and housing properties. The company owns 40 centers and 1 other retail property. Citycon Oyj was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.
